error.signature: Warning: Check block assertion failed: condition evaluated to false
error.regex: (Check block assertion failed|check .+ condition .+ false|assertion .+ failed|check .+ error_message)

verdict.summary: A check block assertion condition evaluated to false, indicating infrastructure does not meet the expected state.

dead_ends.action: Remove the check block to suppress the warning
dead_ends.why_fails: Check blocks exist to catch infrastructure drift and misconfigurations; removing them hides real problems

dead_ends.action: Change the condition to always return true
dead_ends.why_fails: Hardcoding true defeats the purpose of the check and leaves infrastructure issues undetected

workarounds.action: Fix the underlying infrastructure issue that the check block detected
workarounds.how: Read the error_message from the check block, identify the failing condition, and fix the resource or data source

workarounds.action: Update the check condition if the assertion is outdated or too strict
workarounds.how: Review the check block condition and error_message; adjust the condition to reflect current valid states

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Invalid reference is about syntax/type errors in expressions; check block assertion is about runtime condition evaluation
